resources.string: For this tutorial, I have downloaded some 50 x 50 pixels icons in PNG format. You can use your own icons if you want. Once your icons are ready, drag the icons from your folder to the project drawable-mdpi directory. Next create a new Java class in your project and named it Weather.java. This class will be used to create a custom ArrayAdapte r and to bind the objects with the ListView later in this tutorial. Following is the code of Weather. java class. It has two simple properties icon and title and a typical class constructor to initialize the properties.
